package.name: M2b
package.summary: bnkle-Magento integration. Auto link your bricks & mortar inventory to bnkle and get more customers in store.
package.description:
bnkle.com - let's customers search and see what's available in brick & mortar stores around them.
The official M2b extension allows you to show the Magento store products that are in your bricks and mortar stores to customers searching with bnkle.com
M2b extension features
Auto sync inventory: Your Magento store inventory is auto synced to your free bnkle account. inc:
- Product title
- Product description
- Pricing - Search tags
- Images - Options (color,size, etc)
- Magento product url (users click through for direct purchase - free site traffic)
- Stock levels (inventory is auto refreshed daily)
These features allow quick and simple creation as well as management of product listings on bnkle. Significantly reduce time required for listing maintenance.
Other functions on your free bnkle.com dashboard
Product controls
- Control which of your Magento store categories you want to be searchable on bnkle
- Control which of your Magento store products you want to be searchable on bnkle
Multiple store locations
– identify all your store locations and match listings to the locations
Analytics
- see how individual products are performing
- see which stores are performing best, by product, by store
- see which products are being clicked through to your Magento store
Traffic flow - Control how many product views you will get each month
- Free flow: 1,000 free product views per month
- Smooth flow: @65 cents per 1,000 views Set a monthly spend that is evenly spread
- Rush hour: Set a monthly budget to run in response to search demand
Visit bnkle.com/sellers to create your free account
